DRUMS SEQUENCED BY KRIA
CYCLES THROUGH NOTES 0-15
1 CLOCK

KRIA CHANNEL 1 NOTE = OFFSET
KRIA CHANNEL 1 OCT = CHANNEL



#1
KR.CLK 1; A KR.POS 1 1
Y KR.CV 1; X / Y N 12
B / % Y N 12 N 1
C - PN 0 B 3; X + 1 X
CV X N % + 16 + A C 16
DEL 11: TR.P X

#2
DEL.X 3 33: TR.P 1
CV 2 N PARAM

#3

#4

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M
IF - Z PARAM: SCRIPT 2
ELSE: CV 2 0
Z PARAM

#I
TR.TIME 1
L 1 4: CV.SLEW I 0
PARAM.SCALE 0 24
M 100
CV.SLEW 2 100
TR.TIME 1 20

#P
0	0	0	0
